Topic.Title: Johnie Flyktning Gang's Many Unavoidable Problems

Message.Msg: Great to see you once again dr_clarify! As you can see, this place is a ghost town ever since aqgut effectively scoured out the disease(d). Sully still rules here and in the stock market world. Because of Sully's keen prowess, we are reaping massive gains. At Sully's begging we pulled out of aapl after riding it up for years and placed everything into goog! I only wish we had pulled out of aapl at 700 instead of 650. And elike is still winning with ebay. Drop us another line when you get a chance Doc, eh? We need some real writers here! -Sully Rules

Topic.Title: Do You Think EBAY is a BUY, SELL, or HOLD?

Message.Title: Check out what Honda Motors just did with SolarCity -- Game Changer......
Message.Msg: SolarCity just went public just a few weeks ago --- California based large solar panel -INSTALLER- and that is critical --cause the installer sector of the solar energy field is booming using cheap Chinese and others panels... What SolarCity specializes in is financing the installation so the homeowner gets the panels for free and pays a monthly payment for the electricity at cheaper rates than off the grid, while SolarCity maintains the system for them.... Honda motors just inject $65 million into the company and is having their Honda Auto dealers push the solar installation with SolorCity.... Long range that helps Honda since it creates the base infrastructure it needs in home electric panels to home fuel it`s electric, hybrids and the hydrogen cars it`s introducing .... all of which can use the cheap homebased solar electricity whose rates stay stable over the years compared to the utilities.... Smart of the Japanese --- again.
